actions.desc: The forest drake makes one bite attack and one claw attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.desc: The drake exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Mighty Leap
